title: Drag n Drop Selector
shortDescription: A dynamic Angular-based tool enabling users to select and save schedule preferences through an intuitive drag-and-drop interface.

longDescription.issue: The previous dropdown-based component was cumbersome and lacked user-friendly interaction for managing schedule preferences.
longDescription.solution: Developed a full-stack solution with an Angular frontend, Node.js/Express backend, and SQL database, implementing a custom drag-and-drop component that allows users to filter, highlight, and transfer multiple options efficiently. This tool is actively used by thousands of employees at a Fortune 100 company to streamline schedule management.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Gained expertise in optimizing API performance for large-scale applications and integrating custom components into existing enterprise systems, ensuring scalability and maintainability.

title: YelpCamp
shortDescription: A MERN-stack application for discovering, saving, and reviewing campsites with a user-friendly interface.

longDescription.issue: Users struggled to find and review campsites due to limited specialized platforms compared to general business review sites like Yelp.
longDescription.solution: Engineered a full-stack web application using React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, featuring a responsive frontend and robust backend to enable users to create accounts, save campsites, and submit reviews seamlessly.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Mastered the MERN stack, focusing on integrating React for dynamic UIs, Express for efficient API routing, MongoDB for scalable data storage, and Bootstrap for responsive design.
longDescription.extraInfo: You may create a free account on the website to test the application.

title: Bob's Computer Repair
shortDescription: A MEAN-stack e-commerce platform for a computer repair shop with secure payment processing.

longDescription.issue: The client required a cost-effective, scalable online store with a shopping cart and secure payment integration for their computer repair services.
longDescription.solution: Led a team of three developers to build a full-stack e-commerce platform using Angular, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, incorporating Stripe for secure payments and designing a user-centric interface with Bootstrap for responsiveness.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Developed proficiency in the MEAN stack, applied waterfall methodology for project management, and emphasized rigorous testing to ensure a reliable user experience.
longDescription.extraInfo: Demo credentials: Standard User > username: [mozart], password: [Password01] | Admin User > username: [bach], password: [Password01]

title: Contact Pro
shortDescription: A .NET-based web application for managing contacts with create, edit, and delete functionalities.

longDescription.issue: Users needed an efficient, secure platform to organize and manage contact information with full CRUD capabilities.
longDescription.solution: Developed a full-stack application using .NET Core for the backend, paired with a responsive frontend built with Bootstrap and CSS, enabling seamless contact management with a focus on scalability and user experience.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Acquired expertise in .NET Core for robust backend development, enhanced skills in responsive design with Bootstrap, and deepened understanding of secure data handling practices.
longDescription.extraInfo: The application is designed for easy integration with existing systems and supports user authentication for secure access.

title: NodeBucket
shortDescription: A MEAN-stack to-do application for managing class assignments with AI-generated visuals.

longDescription.issue: Students needed a simple, intuitive tool to track and manage class assignments efficiently.
longDescription.solution: Developed a full-stack to-do application using Angular, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, integrating AI-generated imagery for enhanced visual appeal and implementing comprehensive testing for reliability.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Strengthened expertise in the MEAN stack, explored AI-driven image generation for UI enhancement, and reinforced the importance of thorough testing in application development.

title: Teams Tracker
shortDescription: An Angular-based frontend app for managing Microsoft Teams members with drag-and-drop functionality.

longDescription.issue: Microsoft Teams lacked native functionality to reorganize participants during meetings, unlike competitors such as Zoom.
longDescription.solution: Designed and developed an Angular-based frontend application with drag-and-drop functionality to enable dynamic tracking and reorganization of Teams members, adopted by a Fortune 100 company for daily stand-up meetings.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Mastered Angular for building interactive UIs, advanced drag-and-drop mechanics, and applied CSS for polished, responsive designs tailored to enterprise needs.

title: CSS Animations
shortDescription: A collection of engaging CSS and JavaScript animations showcasing creative visual effects.

longDescription.issue: Needed a platform to experiment with and demonstrate advanced CSS and JavaScript animation techniques.
longDescription.solution: Created a curated set of responsive animations using CSS and JavaScript, designed to enhance user engagement and showcase technical proficiency in frontend development.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Deepened expertise in CSS animations, JavaScript for dynamic effects, and cross-browser compatibility to ensure consistent performance.

title: Digital Elegance
shortDescription: A React-based portfolio website showcasing professional skills and photographic artwork.

longDescription.issue: Required a modern, visually appealing platform to display web development projects and sell photographic artwork online.
longDescription.solution: Developed a responsive React-based portfolio with Bootstrap for styling, integrated with a WordPress and WooCommerce backend to showcase and sell photographic artwork, ensuring a seamless user experience across devices.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Enhanced proficiency in React for dynamic interfaces, WordPress/WooCommerce for e-commerce integration, and applied UX/UI principles to create an engaging portfolio.

title: Lizvitation
shortDescription: A personalized Harry Potter-themed wedding invitation with dynamic URL-based customization.

longDescription.issue: Required a unique, interactive wedding invitation tailored to each guest with a Harry Potter theme.
longDescription.solution: Built a JavaScript-based frontend application that dynamically customizes invitations using URL parameters, enhanced with Adobe Photoshop for themed backgrounds and animated SVG footprints for an immersive experience.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Advanced skills in JavaScript for dynamic content generation, CSS for animations, and Photoshop for creating high-quality visual assets tailored to client specifications.

title: Loan App
shortDescription: A TypeScript Angular application for calculating loan payments with a sleek, user-friendly design.

longDescription.issue: Users needed an intuitive tool to calculate monthly loan payments accurately and efficiently.
longDescription.solution: Developed a TypeScript and Angular-based frontend application with a responsive interface, leveraging AI-generated visuals and rigorous testing to ensure precision and usability.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Gained expertise in TypeScript for type-safe development, Angular for structured frontend architecture, and applied generative AI to enhance visual design.

title: In-n-Out Books
shortDescription: An Angular-based application for exploring book and author data via a public API.

longDescription.issue: Manually curating book and author information was time-consuming and prone to errors.
longDescription.solution: Developed an Angular and JavaScript-based frontend application that integrates with a public book database API, delivering dynamic content with a responsive design tested using SoapUI and Swagger.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Mastered API integration with Angular, enhanced skills in JavaScript for data handling, and gained experience with API testing tools like SoapUI and Swagger.

title: Pets-R-Us
shortDescription: An Angular-based pet adoption platform with a responsive, user-friendly interface.

longDescription.issue: Pet adoption platforms needed a streamlined interface to showcase available pet service appointments and facilitate user interaction.
longDescription.solution: Built an Angular-based frontend application with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, featuring a responsive design to display services and enable appointment requests, ensuring accessibility across devices.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Enhanced proficiency in Angular for building modular applications, applied UX/UI principles for intuitive navigation, and improved CSS skills for responsive layouts.
longDescription.extraInfo: The application is designed to integrate with backend APIs for real-time appointment data updates.

title: GPA Calculator App
shortDescription: An Angular-based tool for students to calculate their GPA with ease.

longDescription.issue: Students needed a reliable, user-friendly application to calculate their GPA accurately without manual errors.
longDescription.solution: Developed an Angular-based frontend application using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, featuring an intuitive interface for inputting grades and computing GPAs with real-time feedback.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Strengthened skills in Angular for interactive applications, improved JavaScript logic for calculations, and applied UX principles for a seamless user experience.

title: Composer App
shortDescription: An Angular-based application for exploring composer biographies and works.

longDescription.issue: Music enthusiasts needed an accessible platform to explore detailed information about composers and their works.
longDescription.solution: Built an Angular-based frontend application with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, integrating a clean, responsive design to display composer profiles and musical works dynamically.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Advanced Angular skills for data-driven applications, refined JavaScript for content management, and applied CSS for visually appealing layouts.
longDescription.extraInfo: The application is designed to support future API integration for expanded content.

title: Mark's Bio Site
shortDescription: A responsive biography website showcasing a client’s professional achievements.

longDescription.issue: The client required a professional, visually engaging website to highlight their career and accomplishments.
longDescription.solution: Developed a responsive frontend application using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Angular, designed to showcase biographical content with a modern, user-friendly interface optimized for all devices.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Improved skills in Angular for structured content delivery, enhanced CSS for responsive design, and applied UX/UI principles to meet client expectations.
longDescription.extraInfo: The site is optimized for accessibility and cross-browser compatibility.

title: Flight of Passage Grouper App
shortDescription: A mobile-optimized JavaScript app for managing Disney’s Flight of Passage seating.

longDescription.issue: The existing employee-facing app lacked customer-friendly features and flexibility for managing seating arrangements.
longDescription.solution: Developed a JavaScript-based mobile application using HTML5 canvas, featuring enhanced color and size variations for seat marking, intuitive customer visuals, and employee tools for designating inoperable seats, tailored to the attraction’s theme.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Gained proficiency in HTML5 canvas for interactive graphics, deepened JavaScript skills for mobile applications, and learned resilience through project feedback and iteration.
longDescription.extraInfo: This was built for a Surface Pro 7 Tablet in landscape view. You may use a desktop browser if you can simulate a tablet.

title: Penalty Kick Game
shortDescription: A mobile-friendly JavaScript game simulating a soccer penalty kick experience.

longDescription.issue: Users wanted an engaging, lightweight mobile game to simulate soccer penalty kicks with intuitive controls.
longDescription.solution: Developed a JavaScript-based mobile game using HTML and CSS, featuring responsive animations and user-friendly mechanics to deliver an immersive penalty kick experience.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Enhanced JavaScript skills for game logic, mastered CSS animations for dynamic visuals, and applied mobile-first design principles for optimal performance.
longDescription.extraInfo: Optimized for mobile devices with touch-based controls.

title: Dice Game
shortDescription: A mobile-optimized JavaScript dice game with engaging gameplay mechanics.

longDescription.issue: Users needed a simple, entertaining dice game optimized for mobile devices with smooth interactions.
longDescription.solution: Built a JavaScript-based mobile game using HTML and CSS, featuring randomized dice rolls, responsive design, and intuitive controls to ensure an engaging user experience.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Strengthened JavaScript for game mechanics, refined CSS for mobile animations, and applied UX principles to enhance player interaction.
longDescription.extraInfo: Designed for cross-device compatibility with touch support.

title: Grouper Training App
shortDescription: A mobile app for training employees by giving them a set of random number to simulate groups of patrons.

longDescription.issue: Employees required an interactive mobile tool to practice grouping patrons efficiently by simulating real-world scenarios.
longDescription.solution: Developed a JavaScript-based mobile application using HTML and CSS, featuring a random number generator to simulate patron groups, with a responsive interface designed to enhance training efficiency and engagement.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Advanced JavaScript skills for dynamic random number generation, refined CSS for mobile-optimized layouts, and applied UX/UI principles to create an effective training tool tailored to employee needs.
longDescription.extraInfo: Optimized for mobile devices to support on-the-go training.

title: Wedding Countdown App
shortDescription: A mobile-friendly countdown app for keeping track of wedding dates and budget by showing days left and how much per day needed to save for the big day.

longDescription.issue: Couples needed an intuitive mobile tool to track their wedding countdown and manage budget planning effectively, with clear daily savings goals.
longDescription.solution: Developed a JavaScript-based mobile application using HTML and CSS, featuring a real-time countdown timer and budget calculator that displays remaining days and daily savings needed, designed with a mobile interface.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Enhanced JavaScript expertise for real-time calculations, refined CSS for mobile-optimized designs, and applied UX/UI principles to ensure an intuitive and engaging user experience.
longDescription.extraInfo: This was built to be viewed on a mobile device. You may use a desktop browser if you can simulate a mobile device.

title: Sound Spinner
shortDescription: A mobile-optimized web version of a Fisher-Price sound spinner with modern visuals.

longDescription.issue: Users wanted a portable, modernized version of the classic Fisher-Price sound spinner with enhanced interactivity.
longDescription.solution: Developed a JavaScript-based mobile application using HTML and CSS, integrating animal graphics and sounds from the Google database, with precise rotational animations for an engaging experience.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Mastered JavaScript for complex animations, applied mathematical logic for rotational positioning, and enhanced CSS for mobile-optimized visuals.
longDescription.extraInfo: This was built to be viewed on a mobile device. You may use a desktop browser if you can simulate a mobile device.

title: BB's Toys
shortDescription: A mobile countdown app to teach young children to count backwards playfully.

longDescription.issue: Young children needed an engaging tool to practice counting backwards during idle moments.
longDescription.solution: Developed a JavaScript and PHP-based mobile application with HTML and CSS, featuring animated countdowns and interactive elements to entertain and educate young users.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Strengthened JavaScript and PHP for dynamic animations, mastered CSS for engaging visuals, and applied UX principles to design for young audiences.
longDescription.extraInfo: This was built to be viewed on a mobile device. You may use a desktop browser if you can simulate a mobile device.

title: Pokemon Hatch
shortDescription: A mobile app simulating Pokemon egg hatching using API-driven data and animations.

longDescription.issue: Young Pokemon fans needed an interactive, mobile-optimized app to simulate egg hatching with engaging visuals.
longDescription.solution: Developed a JavaScript-based mobile application using HTML and CSS, integrating the PokeAPI for dynamic Pokemon data and images, with animated hatching sequences for an immersive experience.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Mastered API integration with JavaScript, advanced CSS for animation sequences, and applied mobile-first design for optimal user engagement.
longDescription.extraInfo: This was built to be viewed on a mobile device. You may use a desktop browser if you can simulate a mobile device. **API was not working at last testing**
